src:
Diduga karena Proyek Trotoar, Kabel Bawah Tanah di Cikini Terbakar
03 Nov 2019, 13:48 by Rahel Narda Chaterine
Jakarta - Saluran Kabel Tegangan Rendah (SKTR) yang berada di bawah tanah di kawasan Cikini Raya, Jakarta Pusat, sempat mengeluarkan percikan api pagi hari tadi. Pemicu api diduga karena adanya proses pelebaran trotoar di kawasan tersebut.
"Penyebabnya karena proyek pedestrian yang mengenai kabel SKTR (kabel bawah tanah), sehingga mengakibatkan ada percikan di kabel tersebut sampai membakar di kabel itu," kata Pengawas Perbaikan Lapangan PLN Cabang UP3 Menteng, Kuswoyo, di Jalan Cikini Raya, Menteng, Jakarta Pusat, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Kuswoyo mengatakan saat kejadian itu, ada tiga ruko mengalami mati listrik. Kemudian pihak PLN pun melakukan pemadaman listrik juga di 9 ruko yang ada di sekitar lokasi kejadian.
"Kebetulan yang padam hanya sekitar 3 ruko, ya setelah itu kita lokalisir, kita padamkan sembilan ruko dipadamkan," jelas Kuswoyo.
Menurut Kuswoyo, pihak PLN sudah menindaklanjuti laporan warga terkait peristiwa itu. Saat Kuswoyo datang ke lokasi sekitar pukul 09.00 WIB, api dari kabel itu sudah padam.
"Pokoknya waktu ada laporan, petugas menindaklanjuti laporan tersebut. Saya di sini sekitar jam sembilan kondisinya sudah padam," katanya.
Kuswoyo mengaku baru mendapatkan informasi dari warga sekitar bahwa kabel ini sudah mulai mengeluarkan percikian sejak 1 bulan lalu. Namun, tidak ada warga sekitar yang melaporkan ke pihak PLN.
"Untuk kronologisnya sih infonya dari warga sekitar sekitar 1 bulanan yang lalu. Itu sudah ada yang kena (mengeluarkan percikan) cuma tidak ada yang laporan," ungkapnya.

(zap/gbr)
text:
Allegedly because of the Sidewalk Project, the Underground Cable in Cikini was Burned
03 Nov 2019, 13:48 by Rahel Narda Chaterine
Jakarta - Low Voltage Cable Channels (SKTR) which are underground in the Cikini Raya area, Central Jakarta, had a chance to issue sparks earlier this morning. The trigger for the fire was allegedly due to the widening of the sidewalk in the area.
"The reason is because of the pedestrian project concerning the SKTR cable (underground cable), so that there is a spark on the cable to burn it," said the PLN Field Repair Supervisor Menteng UP3 Branch, Kuswoyo, on Jalan Cikini Raya, Menteng, Central Jakarta, Sunday (3/11/2019).
Kuswoyo said that at the time of the incident, there were three shop houses experiencing power cuts. Then the PLN also did a power outage also in 9 shops around the location of the incident.
"It just so happened that only about 3 shutters went out, so after that we localized, we put out nine shophouses, extinguished," Kuswoyo explained.
According to Kuswoyo, the PLN has followed up on reports from residents related to the incident. When Kuswoyo arrived at the location around 09.00 WIB, the fire from the cable was extinguished.
"Anyway, when there was a report, the officers followed up on the report. I was here around nine o'clock the condition was extinguished," he said.
Kuswoyo claimed that he had only received information from local residents that this cable had begun issuing a conversation since one month ago. However, there are no local residents who report to the PLN.
"For the chronology, the information is from residents around 1 month ago. There have been those who have been hit (issued a spark), but no one has reported," he said.

(zap / pic)
